title: People you'd like to know: John: cystic fibrosis
creator_credit: Janet Weaver and WGBH Educational Foundation
brief_description: Shows the extent of the problems caused by cystic fibrosis, a crippling congestive disease which may affect the pancreas, lungs and other organs, though giving few outward signs of its presence. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
